member.name: T:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryMetadata
member.summary: Metadata describing cache entry lifetime and expiration behavior.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryMetadata.#ctor(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.
member.param: The UTC creation time in ticks.
The absolute expiration UTC time in ticks, or 0 when not set.
The sliding expiration duration in ticks, or 0 when not set.
The stale window duration in ticks, or 0 when not set.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryMetadata.CreatedUtcTicks
member.summary: Gets the UTC creation time in ticks.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryMetadata.AbsoluteExpirationUtcTicks
member.summary: Gets the absolute expiration UTC time in ticks. Returns 0 when not set.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryMetadata.SlidingExpirationTicks
member.summary: Gets the sliding expiration duration in ticks. Returns 0 when not set.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryMetadata.StaleTtlTicks
member.summary: Gets the stale window duration in ticks. Returns 0 when not set.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryMetadata.StaleExpirationUtcTicks
member.summary: Gets the UTC stale expiration time in ticks. Returns 0 when not set.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryMetadata.IsExpired(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns true if the entry is expired and outside its stale window.
member.param: The current UTC time in ticks.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryMetadata.IsStale(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns true if the entry is stale but still within its stale window.
member.param: The current UTC time in ticks.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryMetadata.RefreshSliding(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns a copy of the metadata with refreshed sliding expiration.
member.param: The current UTC time in ticks.

member.summary: Gets the cached value when using object storage.

member.summary: Gets the serialized payload when using binary storage.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntry.Metadata
member.summary: Gets the metadata describing expiration behavior.

member.name: T:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryState
member.summary: Represents the state of a cache lookup.

member.name: F:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryState.Miss
member.summary: The entry was not found.

member.name: F:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryState.Hit
member.summary: The entry was found and is fresh.

member.name: F:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryState.Stale
member.summary: The entry was found but is stale and still within its stale window.

member.name: F:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheEntryState.Expired
member.summary: The entry was found but expired and removed.

member.name: T:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheGetResult
member.summary: Represents the result of a cache lookup.

member.summary: Gets the cache entry state.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheGetResult.Entry
member.summary: Gets the cache entry when present.

member.name: T:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheValueMode
member.summary: Describes how cached values are represented by a cache provider.

member.name: F:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheValueMode.InMemory
member.summary: Values are stored as in-memory objects.

member.name: F:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheValueMode.Binary
member.summary: Values are stored as serialized binary payloads.

member.name: T:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.ICacheKit
member.summary: Provides a unified cache API across memory and distributed providers.
member.remarks: Implementations are expected to be thread-safe for concurrent use.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.ICacheKit.Metrics
member.summary: Gets cache metrics for the current instance.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.ICacheKit.GetAsync``1(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a cached value by key.
member.returns: The cached value, or default if the key was not found or expired.
member.exception: Thrown when is null or whitespace.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.ICacheKit.ExistsAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Checks whether a cached value exists for the specified key.
member.returns: true if the key exists and has not expired; otherwise, false.
member.exception: Thrown when is null or whitespace.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.ICacheKit.SetAsync``1(System.String,``0,JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheEntryOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sets a cache value by key.
member.exception: Thrown when is null or whitespace.
Thrown when TTL, sliding expiration, or stale TTL is not greater than zero.
Thrown when both TTL and sliding expiration are specified.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.ICacheKit.GetOrSetAsync``1(System.String,System.Func{System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask{``0}},JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheEntryOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a cached value or uses the factory to populate it.
member.returns: The cached or newly computed value.
member.exception: Thrown when is null or whitespace.
Thrown when is null.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.ICacheKit.RemoveAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Removes a cached value by key.
member.exception: Thrown when is null or whitespace.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.ICacheKit.InvalidateTagAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Invalidates all cache entries associated with a tag.
member.exception: Thrown when is null or whitespace.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.ICacheKit.InvalidateTagsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection{System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Invalidates all cache entries associated with the provided tags.
member.exception: Thrown when is null.
Thrown when any tag is null or whitespace.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.
member.param: The number of stale hits served.

member.summary: Gets the number of cache misses.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Abstractions.CacheMetricsSnapshot.Sets

member.summary: Provides a unified cache API across memory and distributed providers.
member.remarks: This type is thread-safe and intended for use as a singleton.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Provides dependency injection registration for CacheKit.

member.summary: Adds CacheKit to the service collection.
member.exception: Thrown when is null.

member.name: T:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheEntryOptions
member.summary: Provides cache entry configuration for a specific operation.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheEntryOptions.Ttl
member.summary: Gets or sets the absolute time-to-live for the entry.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheEntryOptions.SlidingExpiration
member.summary: Gets or sets the sliding expiration duration for the entry.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheEntryOptions.StaleTtl
member.summary: Gets or sets the stale window duration for stale-while-revalidate.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheEntryOptions.Tags
member.summary: Gets or sets the tags associated with the entry.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheEntryOptions.Category
member.summary: Gets or sets the category for resolving per-category default options.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheEntryOptions.Validate
member.summary: Validates the options and throws if invalid.
member.exception: Thrown when TTL, sliding expiration, or stale TTL is not greater than zero.
Thrown when both TTL and sliding expiration are specified, or when a tag is null or whitespace.

member.name: T:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheKitOptions
member.summary: Configures cache kit defaults and provider selection.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheKitOptions.DefaultTtl
member.summary: Gets or sets the default absolute TTL for cache entries.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheKitOptions.DefaultSlidingExpiration
member.summary: Gets or sets the default sliding expiration duration.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheKitOptions.DefaultStaleTtl
member.summary: Gets or sets the default stale window duration.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheKitOptions.EnableStaleWhileRevalidate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether stale-while-revalidate is enabled.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheKitOptions.EnableStampedeProtection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether stampede protection is enabled.

member.name: P:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheKitOptions.TimeProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the time provider used for expiration checks.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheKitOptions.UseMemory
member.summary: Configures the cache to use the in-memory provider.

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheKitOptions.UseDistributed
member.summary: Configures the cache to use a distributed provider via .

member.name: M:JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheKitOptions.AddCategoryDefaults(System.String,JG.CacheKit.Policies.CacheEntryOptions)
member.summary: Registers default cache entry options for a category. When is set on an operation, the matching defaults are used for any unset properties.
member.param: The default options for the category.
member.exception: Thrown when is null or whitespace.
Thrown when is null.
